ygData.subject: It's Battle Time!
ygData.msgSnippet: (CODE, your post for damage was incredibly pathetic.  Not to put you down, but that was just sad.  I don t know if it was a joke though.  But, as someone with

Subject: It's Battle Time!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

(CODE, your post for damage was incredibly pathetic.  Not to put you down, 
but that was just sad.  I don't know if it was a joke though.  But, as 
someone with over 20 characters, I have to tell you, having to deal with tons 
of damage to post is hard, and it is not easy to deal with, I'll let you go 
on that last post, but please don't do that again.  Saying all your 
characters are badly damaged is unfair)


Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Serpentor/Chaos/Minion/Unitron/Demon Wulf/Flesh 
Ripper/Dark Claw:



Nemesis Enforcer brought up his left wing to block most of the laser bolts, 
not even feeling anything, but a few bolts hit him in the right side.  
Stumbling back, Nemesis Enforcer quickly stood up again, firing off 25 rapid 
laser bolts at Jetstorm's abdomen.

---

Scattershot jumped to the side as the missiles struck near him, sending him 
flying through the air several feet, slamming to the ground.

---

Unitron raised both rifles, firing off three bolts from each off at Diskus 
(six total), two optic blasts lancing out from his green optic sensors at 
Shockaract.

---

Serpentor fired off a blast from his plasma launcher at Serge's neck.

---

Demon Wulf looked up in annoyance, firing off three red optic blasts at 
Diskus' chest.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off three bolts from his rifle at Grenade's left leg.

---

Dark Claw raised his left open palm, a ball of black energy in hand.  He 
threw the ball at an area only a foot from Shockaract, the ball of energy 
having a grenade like affect.

---

Minion yelled out as mutliple weapons send him cartwheeling in jeep mode, 
landing over ten feet away from where he had been, turned over.

---

Chaos activated the large missile launcher in the back of his vehicle mode 
(Missile trailer).  He got a target lock, and fired off a single five foot 
long missile off at Gigas.
